title: La Estrella de Mar
subtitle: The Starfish
meta_desc: Learn starfish vocabulary in Spanish with audio. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, ocean animals Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: La Estrella de Mar
pages.prompt: A beautiful realistic orange starfish on white sand underwater, five perfect arms, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La estrella tiene cinco brazos.
pages.prompt: A realistic starfish on a rock showing all five arms spread out perfectly, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La estrella es anaranjada.
pages.prompt: A bright realistic orange starfish on white coral sand, vivid color contrast, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La estrella camina despacio.
pages.prompt: A realistic starfish slowly moving across the ocean floor, tiny tube feet visible, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La estrella vive en el fondo.
pages.footer: The starfish lives at the bottom.
pages.prompt: A realistic starfish on the sandy ocean floor among shells and small rocks, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La estrella es bonita.
pages.prompt: A beautiful realistic colorful starfish on a vibrant coral reef, stunning natural beauty, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.
